changes.description: Add experimental IncludeMarkup component
Inline styles on components with the bindTo property applied will not style the label. Also fixed NumberBox adornment location when writing mode is right-to-left.
Use the new website project as the target of component document generation
Fix bookmark navigation in nested apps (xmlui-pg playground examples)
Add itemWidth property to Stack and FlowLayout
Change component document generation to the new link format
Remove global variables from compnent files
Fix virtualization issues with List and Table
Fix shrinking Table selection checkbox
feat: improve NavPanel by using NavSection placeholder components for dynamic nav element generation
Fix initialPrimarySize issue with Splitter
fix: handle active heading state in TableOfContents and update indicator visibility
Fix <script> + code-behind function declaration regression
fix: enhance footer behavior in App component
fix: toc - smoothScrolling
APICall allows access to error response details
Actions.upload now allows field name
Fix Bookmark scrolling issue with xmlui-pg
Additional component metadata: "excludeBehaviors", "deprecationMessage"
Remove multiple adjacent separators from DropdownMenu and ContextMenu
fix: scroll behavior handling in TableOfContents and AppContent components
Ensure vite dev server restarts when a module changes
Fix Tree collapseNode to mark the node unloaded
Allow Tree.replaceNode to change the node ID
Improve inspector trace logging with additional event data
Global variable handling redesigned
Fix return from try..catch
Conservative refactoring of containers and state management
Removed react-icons as a dependency.
Add inspector logging infrastructure for debugging XMLUI applications
- when using `parseAs`, remember the filename(s) and report them in the input box
improve TableOfContents component
Fix Fragment visibility regression
Add module import to standalone apps
Fix <script> layout issue in App
Extend Tree API with replaceNode and replaceChildren
Experimenting with publish/subscribe behavior
Minor Splitter improvements
Add global variables to xmlui (Globals.xs)
Fix breaking component links (404) in docs
feat: implement navpanelFooter and NavPanelCollapseButton (experimental)
Fix Windows-specific module resolution issues
Fix ContextMenu regressions
Add icon to SubMenuItem
Updated FileUploadDropZone so the default styling is more user friendly.
Fix onContextMenu issues with Tree
Fixed issue with markdown links to properly download resource files.
Experiment with module imports
Tweaked ExpandableItem styles so the summary button appears interactable.
Add selectAll, cut, copy, paste, and delete actions (with keybindings) to Table
fix: labelBehavior - double label issue
fix: window.\_\_PUBLIC_PATH prefix applying twice to icon resources, making them not resolve to anything.
Extend Table with userSelect properties
Review the async loading of Tree items
feat: Open up possibility for custom components to receive input behaviors via an API/context
Add scrollStyle and showScrollerFade to Tree
Removed timeout properties from onValidate.
improve: Provide accessible text label for RadioGroup
Allow the "new" keyword in object literals as property name
Migrate Table to virtua (from @tanstack/react-virtual)
Experiment with deferred APICall
Parse async/await in scripts but raise error when executing
Allow Column to use layout properties
Parse new operator but raise error when executing
Experimental generation of context variables
Fix <li> issue with Markdown in Firefox
Fix the inconsistent URL encoding between url and queryParams
Add ScrollViewer component
Document and improve ContextMenu
- Columns with bindTo are now sortable by default
Add QRCode component
Add scrollStyle property to Stack, FlowLayout, and NavPanel
Add ContextMenu component
Added completed state theme variable for ProgressBar called "color-indicator-ProgressBar--complete".
Added validation timeout handling for input fields. New properties include customValidationsTimeout and customValidationsTimeoutMessage.
upgrade @remix-run/react to 2.17.4, migrate imports to react-router-dom
Add contextMenu event to several components
Add scroll fading effect
Review markdown rendering and theming
Add experimental MessageListener component
Fix scroll issues with List virtualization
Added itemRequiredIndicator property to Form to control required/optional indicators for FormItems on the form level.
make goto-definition reach components across the whole opened workspace
Change the indicator in TableOfContents
Add iconAlignment to NavLink and NavGroup
Add new Theme variables to NavLink and NavGroup
Experiment with documentation theme
Add overflowMode and breakMode to Markdown
Renamed requiredIndicator to requireLabelMode and itemRequiredIndicator to itemRequireLabelMode.
In the Search box, hitting Enter opens the first match when none selected.
Added requiredIndicator property to FormItem to customize required/optional indicators next to labels. Options are: "required", "optional", "both". Default is "required".
Fix alignment issues with Text
Fix Column sortable regression
Fix List visibility issue in Markdown
Removed language-server-web-worker export from package.json
